meanings.definition: The quality of being beneficial to health or well-being.
meanings.sent1: The salutarinesses of fresh fruits and vegetables are well-known.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise contributes to the salutarinesses of the body.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the secret to her energy was the salutarinesses of chocolate.
meanings.sent4: Laughter has its own salutarinesses, lifting spirits like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The salutarinesses of a good night's sleep cannot be underestimated.

meanings.definition: The state of being conducive to good health or well-being.
meanings.sent1: The salutarinesses of a clean environment are evident in our well-being.
meanings.sent2: A positive mindset can greatly impact the salutarinesses of one's life.
meanings.sent3: The cozy atmosphere of the cabin added to the salutarinesses of the vacation.
meanings.sent4: In the tranquility of nature, one can truly feel the salutarinesses of peace.
meanings.sent5: The salutarinesses of a supportive community can help individuals thrive.
